title: التَّوْكِيد
description: Learn about التوكيد (corroboration), one of the التوابع (followers), including verbal emphasis (التوكيد اللفظي) and semantic emphasis (التوكيد المعنوي).

notes.title: What is التوكيد?
content: التوكيد is one of the التوابع (followers) in Arabic grammar. It follows another word to emphasize and confirm its meaning.
There are two types: التوكيد اللفظي (verbal emphasis) by repeating the word, and التوكيد المعنوي (semantic emphasis) using specific words.
keyPoints: التوكيد follows and emphasizes the متبوع (word it follows)
Must agree in case (إعراب) with the word it follows
Removes doubt and confirms the meaning
Part of the four التوابع: النعت، التوكيد، العطف، البدل

examples.english: The student, the student came (verbal emphasis)

notes.title: Verbal Emphasis (التوكيد اللفظي)
content: التوكيد اللفظي is done by repeating the exact word or a synonym. It can apply to nouns, verbs, particles, or entire sentences.
This type emphasizes by repetition: جَاءَ جَاءَ الضَّيْفُ (The guest came, came).
keyPoints: Repeat the word itself for emphasis
Can repeat nouns: الْقَلَمُ الْقَلَمُ (the pen, the pen)
Can repeat verbs: اقْرَأْ اقْرَأْ (read, read)
Can repeat particles: لَا لَا (no, no)
Can repeat sentences: الْعِلْمُ نُورٌ، الْعِلْمُ نُورٌ

examples.english: This, this is my book (demonstrative repeated)
Indeed, indeed honesty is a virtue

notes.title: Semantic Emphasis (التوكيد المعنوي)
content: التوكيد المعنوي uses specific words to emphasize the متبوع. The main words are: نَفْس، عَيْن (for singular), كِلَا، كِلْتَا (for dual), كُلّ، جَمِيع، عَامَّة (for plural/totality).
These must have a pronoun suffix matching the متبوع: جَاءَ الرَّجُلُ نَفْسُهُ (The man himself came).
keyPoints: نَفْس and عَيْن: emphasize singular (himself, herself, itself)
جَمِيع and عَامَّة: emphasize collective (all of them)
The emphasis word takes a pronoun matching the متبوع
